Articles.Content:
If any Squad staff see this: I tried to change my password in the Bugtracker. I got the email, clicked the link and changed it. However, it did not accept my password when I then tried to log in multiple times. So I tried to reset again, but this time was sent a security notification.

There is no link or anything for tech help on this, so if anyone has suggestions, I'd appreciate it.

 

BTW; The bug is that if you build a craft with fireworks, the colors are often reset when you go back to the SPH.  This means having to manually redo them every time.

Edited June 27, 2021 by Klapaucius
typo--as always

Wow... OK, I will pass this along to the appropriate people
Also, we are already aware of the firework issue... but thank you for trying to log it!

4 minutes ago, Just Jim said:

Wow... OK, I will pass this along to the appropriate people
Also, we are already aware of the firework issue... but thank you for trying to log it!

Thanks

 

PS. I think you will enjoy my new creation.  I'll now eagerly await the bug patch before continuing.

Edited June 27, 2021 by Klapaucius
